昆虫食: (こんちゅうしょく) - entomophagy; insect eating
昇り: (のぼり) - ascent/climbing/ascending (path)/climb; (上り only)  up-train (e.g. going to Tokyo); northward (towards Tokyo)
昇り口: (のぼりくち) - (esp. 上 for stairs, 登 for mountain) starting point for an ascent (mountain, stairs, etc.); base (of mountain, etc.)
昇り竜: (ノボリリュウ) - rising dragon; white saddle (Helvella crispa)/elfin saddle/common helvel
昇り降り: (のぼりふり) - rising and falling; going up and down
昇り龍: (ノボリリュウ) - rising dragon; white saddle (Helvella crispa)/elfin saddle/common helvel
昇る: (のぼる) - to ascend/to go up/to climb; (usu. 昇る) to ascend (as a natural process, e.g. the sun)/to rise; to go to (the capital); to be promoted; to add up to; to advance (in price); to swim up (a river)/to sail up; to come up (on the agenda)
昇任: (しょうにん) - (ant: 降任) promotion; advancement
昇圧機: (しょうあつき) - booster (e.g. of current)
昇格人事: (しょうかくじんじ) - promotion; appointment to a more senior position

昇竜: (しょうりゅう) - rising dragon; great dash
昇竜拳: (しょうりゅうけん) - shoryuken; uppercut move in the Street Fighter video game series

昇給: (しょうきゅう) - (ant: 降給) salary raise

昇進人事: (しょうしんじんじ) - promotion; appointment to a more senior position

昇龍拳: (しょうりゅうけん) - shoryuken; uppercut move in the Street Fighter video game series
明: (mei/myou/a/aka/aki) - bright , vidya (wisdom); mantra; the coming (July 4, etc.)
明々: (あかあか) - brightly lit; brightly lighted; lit up; lighted up
明々後日: (みょうみょうごにち) - (yoji) (in) three days' time (two days after tomorrow)
明々白々: (めいめいはくはく) - (yoji) clearly evident; quite obvious; as clear as day; beyond any doubt; strikingly apparent
明い: (あかるい) - bright/colourful; cheerful; (as 〜に明るい) familiar (with)/knowledgeable (about); fair (e.g. politics)/clean
明かし: (あかし) - light (esp. as a religious offering); lamp
明かす: (あかす) - to pass (e.g. the night)/to spend; to reveal/to divulge
明かへん: (あかへん) - useless; no good; hopeless
明かり: (あかり) - (明かり, 明り only) light/illumination/glow/gleam; lamp/light

明かり取り: (あかりとり) - skylight; dormer; transom; dormer window

明かり窓: (あかりまど) - transom; skylight; dormer window
明かり障子: (あかりしょうじ) - paper screen door for admitting light
明き: (あき) - space/room/emptiness/gap; opening/vacancy/empty seat; free time/time to spare; disuse/unused thing
明き巣: (あきす) - empty house; empty nest; prowler/sneak thief/cat burglar
明き店: (あきみせ) - empty house; empty shop
明き盲: (あきめくら) - illiterate or blind person; person who sees without understanding; amaurosis
明く: (あく) - (esp. 開く) to open (e.g. doors); (esp. 開く) to open (e.g. business, etc.); (esp. 空く) to be empty; (esp. 空く) to be vacant/to be available/to be free; (esp. 明く) to be open (e.g. neckline, etc.); (esp. 明く) to have been opened (of one's eyes, mouth, etc.); (esp. 明く) to come to an end; (esp. 明く) to open (one's eyes, mouth, etc.); to have a hole/to form a gap/to have an interval (between events)
明くる日: (あくるひ) - next day; following day
明け: (あけ) - (ant: 暮れ・1) dawn/daybreak; end/soon after something has ended; beginning (of a new year, month, etc.)
明けっぱなし: (あけっぱなし) - leaving open/leaving ajar; outspoken/frank
明けっぴろげ: (あけっぴろげ) - unguarded; frank; open
明けっ広げ: (あけっぴろげ) - unguarded; frank; open
明けっ放し: (あけっぱなし) - leaving open/leaving ajar; outspoken/frank
明けておめでとうございます: (あけておめでとうございます) - (slang form of 明けまして...) Happy New Year
明けても暮れても: (あけてもくれても) - day in and day out; all the time
明けの明星: (あけのみょうじょう) - morning star; Lucifer; Venus in the morning sky
明けましておめでとうございます: (あけましておめでとうございます) - Happy New Year
明けやらぬ: (あけやらぬ) - still dark; not yet dawn
明ける: (あける) - (開ける only) to open (a door, etc.)/to unwrap (e.g. parcel, package)/to unlock; (開ける only) to open (for business, etc.); (esp. 空ける) to empty/to remove/to make space/to make room; (esp. 空ける) to move out/to clear out; (esp. 空ける) to be away from (e.g. one's house)/to leave (temporarily); (esp. 明ける) to dawn/to grow light; (esp. 明ける) to end (of a period, season); (esp. 明ける) to begin (of the New Year); (esp. 明ける) to leave (one's schedule) open/to make time (for); to make (a hole)/to open up (a hole)
明け六つ: (あけむつ) - the sixth hour of the morning
明け払う: (あけはらう) - to open; to vacate
明け放し: (あけはなし) - leaving open/leaving ajar; outspoken/frank
明け放す: (あけはなす) - to open wide (doors, windows, etc.); to fling open
明け放れる: (あけはなれる) - to give way to the light of the morning (i.e. the darkness gives way)
明け暮れ: (あけくれ) - morning and evening; all the time
明け暮れる: (あけくれる) - to do nothing but; to spend all one's time doing
明け残る: (あけのこる) - to remain in the morning sky (i.e. the moon and stars)
明け渡す: (あけわたす) - to vacate; to surrender
明け烏: (あけがらす) - daybreak sound of a crow; (name of) poetry anthology
明け番: (あけばん) - day off; off duty

明け透け: (あけすけ) - honest; open; frank; outspoken
明し暮らす: (あかしくらす) - to spend one's days and nights doing ...
